DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate glycemic effect supplementation Fibers orange juice . This double-blind parallel control study . Each subject serve control . Study population include 10 subject . The subject randomly assign receive one two juice occasion , two visit . Each drink contain orange juice with\without fiber .
DOC.brief_title: The Glycemic Effect Taking Supplementation Orange Juice With Fibers
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteers Age 60 > 18 year Written inform consent Consumers orange drink : freshly squeeze juice , commercial pasteurize juice / orange soft drink Regular eating pattern Patients chronic disease sach : diabetes , cancer , C.O.P.D. , metabolic syndrome , overweight , kidney failure , heart disease , osteoporosis . Antibiotic treatment last 4 week Subjects regular probiotic prebiotic supplementation , unless 2 week wash . Subjects intestinal disorder : IBD , IBS , celiac , colon cancer . Subjects intestinal surgery . Use medicine lower cholesterol ( simvastatin ) , sugar control Pregnancy
